Class EqualLengthCompression

  • java.lang.Object
    • Compression
      • EqualLengthCompression

  • public class EqualLengthCompression
extends Compression
    Subclass of Compression class which builds an alphabet with equal-length codes.

    • Method Detail

      • setupDictionaryFromString

        public void setupDictionaryFromString(java.lang.String alphabet)
        Builds equal-length codes for an alphabet. The amount of binary numbers per symbol is determined by the entropy equation of an equal-length alphabet.

        Let n = size of alphabet

        Entropy for equal-length alphabet = Math.ceil( log(n) / log(2) )

        Overrides:
        setupDictionaryFromString in class Compression
        Parameters:
        alphabet - alphabet to be built into dictionary

      • setupDictionaryFromFile

        public void setupDictionaryFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Builds equal-length codes for an alphabet. After reading file's contents builds codes with buildEqualLengthCodesFromString()
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name

        Precondition: fileName has ".txt" extension. Example: if fileName is "alphabet" pass as "alphabet.txt"

      • padString

        private java.lang.String padString(java.lang.String text,
                                   int padAmount)
        Pads text with 0's to account for place holder 0's in equal-length encoding
        Parameters:
        text - text to be padded with 0's
        padAmount - how much to pad
        Returns:
        text padded with 0's

      • printCodes

                throws java.lang.Exception
        Prints dictionary's keys and codes
        Overrides:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if originalAlphabetOrder is null
